Name: Sea Beast's Scourge
Effect: When Stormbreaker is used:Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

Name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
Effect: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

Name: Summoner of Storm
Effect: Increases the Level of Tidecaller by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Name: Stunning Revenge
Effect: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional Electro DMG.

Name: Crimson Tidewalker
Effect: Increases the Level of Stormbreaker by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Name: Bane of Evil
Effect: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.
